recover-account.title: WorkStation
recover-account.heading: Recover Account
recover-account.instructions: Enter your email to recover your account. We will send you a code to change your password.

dashboard.title: WorkStation
dashboard.description: We enable thousands of people to easily access shared workspaces, private offices, and meeting rooms around the world.

basic.name: Basic Plan
basic.description: Access to shared workspaces with standard internet connection and user community. Does not include access to private rooms or premium tools. Ads displayed in the workspace.

intermediate.name: Intermediate Plan
intermediate.description: Access to shared workspaces with fast connection and some advanced tools. Less advertising within the platform and limited access to private meeting rooms.

premium.name: Premium Plan
premium.description: Full access to private offices, meeting rooms, and exclusive tools. No ads and 24/7 priority support to resolve issues or inquiries immediately.

item1.title: Office in San Miguel
item1.description: Find our offices to work in Lima...

item2.title: Changing Rooms in Miraflores
item2.description: From modern desks to cozy workstations...

searchResults.title: Top results
searchResults.description: Explore, book and make your workday productive and comfortable!
